title: user signup with email verification and role assignment
description: Test the user signup endpoint to ensure new users can register with valid username, email, password, and role. Verify that email verification is triggered and the user is assigned the correct role.

title: user login with jwt authentication and role retrieval
description: Test the user login endpoint to verify that users can authenticate with valid credentials and receive JWT tokens along with their assigned role.

title: email verification with valid and invalid tokens
description: Test the email verification endpoint to confirm that valid tokens activate user accounts and invalid or expired tokens return appropriate errors.

title: event management create read update delete operations
description: Test the event management endpoints to ensure hosts can create, retrieve, update, and delete events with proper authentication and data validation.

title: join event using valid and invalid join codes
description: Test the join event endpoint to verify that attendees can join events using valid join codes and receive errors for invalid codes.

title: face enrollment with valid image upload
description: Test the face enrollment endpoint to ensure users can upload a valid base64 encoded facial image for biometric embedding extraction and encryption.

title: mark attendance live with face recognition
description: Test the live attendance marking endpoint to verify that attendance is correctly marked using live facial recognition images, including handling of unrecognized faces and duplicate markings.

title: list attendance records with role based access
description: Test the attendance records retrieval endpoint to ensure hosts can view all attendance records for their events and attendees can only view their own records.

title: user profile management get and update
description: Test the user management endpoints to verify that users can retrieve and update their profile details except biometric data, with proper authentication.

title: list enrollments for students
description: Test the enrollment management endpoint to ensure students can view their enrollments in events with accurate data.
